article.headline: Butler 82, Tulane 61
article.story: INDIANAPOLIS (AP) -- Brandon Polk scored 26 points on 9-of-13 shooting and Butler led by double digits through most of the second half to beat Tulane 82-61 Wednesday night. Avery Sheets scored 16, A.J. Graves 14 and Bruce Horan 12 for Butler (3-3), which led by 23 with 2:07 left. Polk also had six rebounds. Quincy Davis had 12 points for the Green Wave, who never led. Chris Moore added 11 and Donnie Stith 10 for Tulane (1-2). The Bulldogs took an early 10-0 lead and stretched it to 40-32 at the break. The teams each shot about 46 percent from the field, as Tulane went 23-of-50 and Butler 23-of-49, but the Bulldogs outshot the Green Wave from beyond the arc and from the free-throw line. Butler was 8-of-19 on 3-pointers compared with 4-of-10 for Tulane. The Bulldogs also took advantage of many more trips to the line, shooting 77 percent (28-of-36) compared with the Green Wave's nearly 69 percent (11-of-16).

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
